prepares to open the first dealership in Los Angeles Monday and deliver the first batch of special edition Prima Edizione Fiat 500s next month. Sergio Marchionne , CEO of both Chrysler and Fiat, said the Fiat 500 doesn't have ambitions to conquer the U.S. market. It was designed for select areas. Volumes are small.
